text: Maicon Festa Santana (born 22 February 1989) is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a forward for Hong Kong Premier League club Yuen Long. 【港超】佳聯元朗擬添3森巴兵保持攻力 「元朗人」法比奧：「盼球迷續支持球隊」 Ming Pao 10 August 2019 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Caxias |2011 |Série C |1||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- |Iraty |2012 |colspan="3" rowspan="6"|– |6Appearances in the Campeonato Paranaense||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||6||0 |- |Tupy |2016 |4Appearances in the Campeonato Gaúcho Acesso||1||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||4||1 |- |Passo Fundo |rowspan="2"|2018 |12||3||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||12||3 |- |Próspera |5Appearances in the Campeonato Catarinense Série C||2||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||5||2 |- |Bagé |rowspan="2"|2019 |14||3||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||14||3 |- |Juventus Jaraguá |6Appearances in the Campeonato Catarinense Série B||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||6||0 |- |Yuen Long |2019–20 |Premier League |0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- !
